name: Dwindle
description:
Puzzle dungeon where you can only carry one item. Your only light source is your lamp and the only type of items are keys. Manage your inventory correctly to help Winkie Wisp navigate back to the spirit world while avoiding Lurkies, Weepies, and Doppies.
Controls:

WASD/UDLR - move
